comments:
The following exception is thrown when a binding operation's fault points to an inexistent operation fault. This can cause the model to get into an invalid state where all components following the one causing the exception will not be reconciled properly. Example WSLD file and test case to follow soon.

org.eclipse.emf.common.util.BasicEList$BasicIndexOutOfBoundsException: index=0, size=0
	at org.eclipse.emf.common.util.BasicEList.get(BasicEList.java:512)
	at org.eclipse.wst.wsdl.internal.impl.BindingFaultImpl.reconcileReferences(BindingFaultImpl.java:414)
	at org.eclipse.wst.wsdl.internal.impl.WSDLElementImpl.reconcileReferences(WSDLElementImpl.java:1440)
	at org.eclipse.wst.wsdl.internal.impl.BindingOperationImpl.reconcileReferences(BindingOperationImpl.java:795)
	at org.eclipse.wst.wsdl.internal.impl.WSDLElementImpl.reconcileReferences(WSDLElementImpl.java:1440)
	at org.eclipse.wst.wsdl.internal.impl.BindingImpl.reconcileReferences(BindingImpl.java:784)
	at org.eclipse.wst.wsdl.internal.impl.WSDLElementImpl.reconcileReferences(WSDLElementImpl.java:1440)
	at org.eclipse.wst.wsdl.internal.impl.DefinitionImpl.handleReconciliation(DefinitionImpl.java:1841)
	at org.eclipse.wst.wsdl.internal.impl.WSDLElementImpl.reconcileContents(WSDLElementImpl.java:1254)
	at org.eclipse.wst.wsdl.internal.impl.WSDLElementImpl.reconcile(WSDLElementImpl.java:1200)
	at org.eclipse.wst.wsdl.internal.impl.WSDLElementImpl.changeAttribute(WSDLElementImpl.java:1173)
	at org.eclipse.wst.wsdl.internal.impl.DefinitionImpl.changeAttribute(DefinitionImpl.java:2002)
	at org.eclipse.wst.wsdl.internal.impl.WSDLElementImpl.eNotify(WSDLElementImpl.java:461)
	at org.eclipse.wst.wsdl.internal.impl.DefinitionImpl.eNotify(DefinitionImpl.java:506)
	at org.eclipse.wst.wsdl.internal.impl.WSDLElementImpl.setElementGen(WSDLElementImpl.java:172)
	at org.eclipse.wst.wsdl.internal.impl.WSDLElementImpl.setElement(WSDLElementImpl.java:356)
	at org.eclipse.wst.wsdl.internal.impl.DefinitionImpl.setElement(DefinitionImpl.java:1709)
	at org.eclipse.wst.wsdl.ui.internal.text.WSDLModelAdapter$1.run(WSDLModelAdapter.java:127)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:113)

Created an attachment (id=53914)
New unit test

Includes a sample file and demonstrates the problem.
Apply to wst.wsdl.tests. Run the AllTestCases suite. There should be only one failure - the new test case.

Created an attachment (id=53915)
Model patch

Fixes BindingFaultImpl to properly look up the fault by name in the corresponding operation.

Apply to wst.wsdl. Re-run the AllTestCases suite - all tests should pass.

This is part of a mass update to close out all stale WTP defects already verified by the reporter but awaiting closure by the assignee.  If you feel this defect was closed inappropriately, please reopen.

Thanks, John Lanuti
